publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3912 Karen Whitefield: ScottishPower Energy People Trust—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of the ScottishPower Energy People Trust which will help fund not-for-profit organisations, agencies and groups that represent vulnerable people living in fuel poverty with a key focus on children; welcomes ScottishPower’s investment of £2 million, which will be administered by a board of independent trustees, and looks forward to the trust supporting the many projects working towards eradicating fuel poverty in Scotland.
S2M-3912 ScottishPower Energy People Trust (lodged on 1 February 2006) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3912 Karen Whitefield: ScottishPower Energy People Trust—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of the ScottishPower Energy People Trust which will help fund not-for-profit organisations, agencies and groups that represent vulnerable people living in fuel poverty with a key focus on children; welcomes ScottishPower’s investment of £2 million, which will be administered by a board of independent trustees, and looks forward to the trust supporting the many projects working towards eradicating fuel poverty in Scotland. Supported by: Donald Gorrie
S2M-3912 ScottishPower Energy People Trust (lodged on 1 February 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-3912 ScottishPower Energy People Trust (lodged on 1 February 2006) Irene Oldfather*
